ovgu.gruppe1.ehskapp

Class PopUpNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • ovgu.gruppe1.ehskapp.PopUpNotification

  • public class PopUpNotification
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for showing and canceling pop up notifications.

    This class makes heavy use of the NotificationCompat.Builder helper class to create notifications in a backward-compatible way.
